caption.p: ( A) Concentration of Brucea javanica oil (BJO) in mouse plasma at different time points after the intravenous administration of BJO-containing liposomes (BJO-LIP) or emulsions (BJO-EMU); ( B) Concentration-dependent inhibitory effects of BJO-containing liposomes and emulsions on human liver tumor cells in vitro; ( C) Effects of BJO-containing liposome and emulsion treatments on the post-treatment weight of tumors in a mouse model. Treatment conditions and doses are as follows: A: Control, B: Cyclophosphamide at 25 mg/kg, C: Emulsions at 180 mg/kg, D: Liposomes at 60 mg/kg, E: Liposomes at 120 mg/kg, F: Liposomes at 180 mg/kg. * and ** indicate p < 0.05 and p < 0.01 vs. Control group A, respectively. Adapted with permission from [ 17].
